@metadata.NOTE: Most English strings are in code. Use checkStrings.js to determine what needs to be translated.

$1 asked the robot to play for them: $1 asked the robot to play for them
$1 at row $2 column $3 would have scored: $1 at row $2 column $3 would have scored $4
$1 challenged your turn, but the diction: $1 challenged your turn, but the dictionary backed you up
$1 gained $2 point{{PLURAL:$2||s}} from: $1 gained $2 point{{PLURAL:$2||s}} from the racks of other players
$1 has asked for advice from the robot: $1 has asked for advice from the robot
$1 has no more tiles, game will be over: $1 has no more tiles, game will be over unless you challenge
$1 has received advice from the robot: $1 has received advice from the robot
notify:challenge-won: $1 has successfully challenged your turn. You have lost the $2 points you scored, and the tiles you played are back on your rack
$1 has taken their turn and now it is yo: $1 has taken their turn and now it is your turn
$1 lost $2 point{{PLURAL:$2||s}} for a r: $1 lost $2 point{{PLURAL:$2||s}} for a rack containing '$3'
'Game timer' only; points lost for each: 'Game timer' only; points lost for each minute the player has gone over their allotted time. Default is 5 points
'Turn timer' lets you set a maximum time: 'Turn timer' lets you set a maximum time for each player to play before they are forced to pass. 'Game timer' is like a chess clock, it lets you set a total amount of time a player has to play all their moves before incurring penalties
A dictionary is optional for human playe: A dictionary is optional for human player games, but you can select one to use to automatically check challenges. A dictionary is required for computer players
Add a message that will be included in t: Add a message that will be included in the invitation email
Add a robot player to this game: Add a robot player to this game
Click <a href='$1'>here</a> to join the: Click here to join the game.
Click <a href='$1'>here</a> to reset you: Click here to reset your password.
Click on a player's name below to remove: Click on a player's name below to remove them from the list
Email a reminder to player whose turn it: Email a reminder to player whose turn it is
Email reminders to players whose turn it: Email reminders to players whose turn it is
Enter a new password. Empty passwords ar: Enter a new password. Empty passwords are discouraged, but will work
First word must be at least two tiles: First word must be at least two tiles
Follow this link to reset your password:: Follow this link to reset your password: $1
For 'Turn timer', this is the maximum ti: For 'Turn timer', this is the maximum time allowed to take a turn. For 'Game timer' this is the total amount of time a player has to play all their moves before incurring penalties
How many seconds the robot must wait bef: How many seconds the robot must wait before it can play. Setting this longer gives the previous player more time to take back their move (or to think!)
If you leave the game your score will st: If you leave the game your score will still count towards the leader board.
It is your turn in your XANADO game: It is your turn in your XANADO game
Join the game and open it in a new windo: Join the game and open it in a new window
Join the game by following this link: $1: Join the game by following this link: $1
Leave blank if you don't want to get ema: Leave blank if you don't want to get emails from XANADO. Emails only relate to gameplay, and addresses are never shared with anyone else
Let the player who has just played take: Let the player who has just played take their move back before the next player has challenged or played
Limit the total number of players who ca: Limit the total number of players who can join this game
Lost your password? Please enter the ema: Lost your password? Please enter the email you registered with, and we'll send you a reset link.
Name by which you want to be known to ot: Name by which you want to be known to others in the game
Name of an existing XANADO user: Name of an existing XANADO user
Name you want to be known as in games: Name you want to be known as in games
Name: Name
Number of points lost for an incorrect c: Number of points lost for an incorrect challenge, either per turn, or per correct word
Open a board to watch the game, but not: Open a board to watch the game, but not play
Open this game in a new window.
Or type the email address of someone who: Or type the email address of someone who is not listed, and click 'Add'
Password reset email has been sent: Password reset email has been sent
Pause the game; stops timers for all pla: Pause the game; stops timers for all players until someone unpauses the game again
Play a sound when a tile is placed: Play a sound when a tile is placed
Play a sound when it's your turn: Play a sound when it's your turn
Player '$1' is not known. Use the 'Sign: Player '$1' is not known. Use the 'Sign up' tab to register.
Predict score for the play as the player: Predict score for the play as the player places each tile. Turn this off if you want the player to calculate their own score, for example during tournament play
Remove the robot from this game.
Require at least this many players to jo: Require at least this many players to join before starting the game. A start player won't be assigned until enough players have joined
Select a 'look and feel' for the game bo: Select a 'look and feel' for the game board
Select the game you want to play: Select the game you want to play
Select the letter for the blank: Select the letter for the blank
Select whether the robot player can issu: Select whether the robot player can issue challenges
Send emails to invite people to join the: Send emails to invite people to join the game
Sorry, but email is not available on thi: Sorry, but email is not available on this server. You will have to ask the server admin for your password.
The word{{PLURAL:$1||s}} $2 {{PLURAL:$1|: The word{{PLURAL:$1||s}} $2 {{PLURAL:$1|was|were}} not found in the dictionary
To play in a game you have to sign in fi: To play in a game you have to sign in first. You may be able to sign in using a public service, such as Google or Facebook, or you can create your own XANADO user.
tooltip-register-pw: Use something you can easily remember. Never re-use a password you use on another site
You are not playing in this game: You are not playing in this game
You can check words after the play is co: You can check words after the play is committed (only the player is told if the word is valid) or have the computer reject unknown words
You can choose a different (usually smal: You can choose a different (usually smaller) dictionary for the robot player to choose words from. 'None' will make it play words from the main Dictionary
You can subtract points for each correct: You can subtract points for each correct word that is challenged, simply subtract a fixed number of points, or make the challenger miss their next turn
You have been invited to play XANADO: You have been invited to play XANADO
You have no more tiles, game will be ove: You have no more tiles, game will be over if your play isn't challenged
or sign in as XANADO user:: or sign in as XANADO user:
